copy.questions: Answer a few questions about your day, what you did and how you are feeling and you will get your very own unique soundtrack for your day based on your answers.
copy.playlist: Based on how your day has gone, here is your personal soundtrack to match your mood and activities. You can listen to the tracks here or save as a spotify playlist and listen anytime.
copy.save: Your personal soundtrack has been saved to Spotify
copy.share: If you like your soundtrack give it a share on social media so your friends can hear your own personal soundtrack.

metaData.metaDescription: Based on how your day has gone, here is your personal soundtrack to match your mood and activities. You can listen to the tracks here or save as a spotify playlist and listen anytime.
metaData.metaTitle: swiftLY | Generate a soundtrack for your day
